title: Inaugural Science Showoff at The Edge: Fri 30 Oct (University of Bath)
text: ( Source : University of Bath ) Need a bit more geek in your life but want to get a proper evening's entertainment at the same time? Geek comedian Steve Cross hosts some of Bath 's top science, comedy and performance talent in a night of clever
